title: This Python training collection covers 113 hours of learning, all for under $36
content:
Macworld

Python is the world’s leading programming language and could help you or a loved one reach new career heights with proper knowledge, practice, and certification. Now, you can achieve all those things with this comprehensive Python certification bundle. It’s currently only $35.97 (reg. $196) through November 27!.

This large-scale collection includes 14 courses featuring 113 hours of intensive instruction in understanding Python and its most popular use cases, from basic page and app building to next-level applications like machine learning and artificial intelligence.

Coursework is geared toward getting absolute beginners up to speed, including training like “Learn to Code with Python 3” and “Python in a Weekend: The Easiest Python for Beginners Course,” so Python basics are made relatable to first-time users. No wonder this Python bundle has a 4.5-star review!

Armed with that foundation, other courses expand into more advanced areas, such as data visualization with Python, machine learning with Python for data science, and more. In addition, all courses are taught by instructors with vast tech expertise and can be studied at any learner’s pace. 

Gift yourself or a special someone lifelong knowledge with this Premium Python Programming Mega Certification Bundle, now just $35.97 through November 27 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon required!

 

The 2023 Premium Python Programming Mega Certification Bundle – $35.97
